original_text:
Aztec Magic Deluxe
Il provider BGaming ha deciso di onorare le divinità azteche con una bella slot dal titolo Aztec Magic Deluxe, ambientata nella foresta del Messico in cui sorgeva l’antica civiltà. I simboli, quindi, sono un continuo richiamo alla Terra e al Sole, elementi cardine di questa cultura.
Come da tradizione BGaming, la grafica salta subito agli occhi per la definizione con cui sono rappresentati i simboli e per la cura dei particolari. a griglia si trova incastonata all’interno di un monile con due torce accese sui pilastri. Nella parte bassa troviamo i tasti principali, tra cui quello per variare le linee di pagamento e la puntata.
La musica è un mix tra i suoni della natura, tra cui lo scrosciare dell’acqua e il verso degli animali che popolano la foresta, e il battito dei tamburi.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco ha 5 rulli e 3 righe, con linee di pagamento variabili da una a quindici. Questa operazione non andrà a influire sul costo per ogni Spin, che varierà sempre tra 0,01 € a 1 €, piuttosto sulle probabilità di vittoria, inferiori con minori linee attive.
Con la funzione Autoplay si possono attivare da 10 a 1.000 giri automatici e attraverso dei parametri scelti in anticipo, si può decidere quando farli interrompere.
Per combinazioni vincenti si intendono tutte quelle che avvengono su una linea di pagamento attiva con simboli adiacenti a partire dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra. Nel caso di più combinazioni vincenti su una stessa linea, allora verrà pagata soltanto la più alta, mentre nel caso di combo su linee diverse, allora le vincite verranno sommate.
La volatilità è media, mentre il valore dell’RTP è molto buono, pari al 96,96%.
Simboli e funzionalità
I simboli base sono sette, quattro non tematici e tre tematici. I primi sono le carte buone per una scala reale, quindi si va dal dieci all’asso. I tre medaglioni invece sono paganti. Il primo quello d’argento può pagare sino a 100 volte la puntata, quello di bronzo sino a 300 e quello dorato sino a 500.
Il guerriero azteco è il simbolo Wild. Oltre a sostituire tutti i simboli tranne lo Scatter, è pagante, anzi, paga più di tutti. Ogni volta che compare, triplica la vincita, ma se compare con 5 simboli si arriva a ricevere sino a 5.000 volte la puntata! La sacerdotessa è invece il simbolo Scatter, e può comparire in ogni parte della griglia. Tre, quattro o cinque Scatter regalano sino a 10 giri gratuiti.
In Aztec Magic Deluxe c’è anche la funzione Gamble per provare a raddoppiare la vincita. In questo caso ogni volta che si deve incassare una somma, si può decidere se rischiarla in un gioco di carte. In questo caso al centro dello schermo comparirà una carta coperta e ai lati due tasti, Red e Black. Il nostro obiettivo è scoprire qual è il colore della carta coperta.

raw_translation.response:
BGaming has decided to honor the Aztec deities with a beautiful slot titled Aztec Magic Deluxe, set in the Mexican forest where the ancient civilization once existed. Symbols are a continuous reference to Earth and Sun, key elements of this culture.

As per BGaming's tradition, the graphics immediately catch the eye for the definitiveness with which the symbols are represented and for the attention to detail. The grid is embedded inside a jewel with two torches lit on the pillars. At the bottom, we can find the main buttons, including the one to change the pay lines and the bet.

The music is a mix of nature sounds, including the sound of water and the cries of the animals populating the forest, and the beat of drums.

Slot Features:
The game grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, with variable pay lines from one to fifteen. This operation will not affect the cost per spin, which will always range from €0.01 to €1, but rather the probability of winning, which decreases with fewer active lines.

With the Autoplay function, you can activate from 10 to 1,000 automatic spins, and through pre-selected parameters, you can decide when to stop them.

Winning combinations refer to all those that occur on an active pay line with adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. In the case of multiple winning combos on the same line, only the highest one will be paid, while in the case of combos on different lines, the winnings will be added together.

The volatility is medium, while the RTP value is very good, at 96.96%.

Symbols and Features:
There are seven basic symbols, four non-themed and three themed. The first represents the cards good for a royal flush, ranging from ten to ace. The three medallions are instead payers. The first, silver, can pay up to 100 times the bet, the bronze up to 300, and the gold up to 500.

The Aztec warrior is the Wild symbol. In addition to replacing all symbols except the Scatter, it is paying, and in fact, it pays more than all. Every time it appears, it triples the winnings, but if it appears with 5 symbols, you can receive up to 5,000 times the bet! The priestess is instead the Scatter symbol, and can appear anywhere on the grid. Three, four or five Scatters give up to 10 free spins.

In Aztec Magic Deluxe there is also the Gamble function to try and double the winnings. In this case, every time a sum must be cashed, you can decide whether to risk it in a card game. In this case, a covered card will appear in the center of the screen, with two buttons on the sides, Red and Black. Our goal is to discover the color of the covered card.

response.headline: Uncovering the Special Features of Aztec Magic Deluxe Slot Game
response.content:
Aztec Magic Deluxe slot game boasts of its various special features that can help players boost their chances of winning. First off, there is the Autoplay function that allows players to activate from 10 to 1,000 automatic spins. Now, players can simply sit back, relax and watch as the reels spin on their behalf. Who knew winning could be this easy?

One of the most sought after feature in any slot game is the Wild symbol, and Aztec Magic Deluxe does not disappoint. In this game, the Wild symbol is represented by the fierce-looking Aztec warrior. It replaces all symbols except for the Scatter symbol and pays the highest amount of winnings. And wait, there's more… every time it appears, it triples the winnings! Talk about being generous, right?

Allow us to introduce to you the Scatter symbol, the beautiful priestess, responsible for triggering the free spins feature. If you’re lucky enough to land three, four, or five Scatters, then you’ll be rewarded with up to 10 free spins! Now, that's what we call a perfect chance to enjoy the game without having to use your own funds. It's like hitting a jackpot, but without hitting the jackpot!

We really appreciate a good gamble, and Aztec Magic Deluxe has got us covered on this one. The Gamble function allows you to try to double your winnings. But here's the catch: a covered card appears in the center of the screen, with two buttons on the sides, Red and Black. You'll have to guess the color of the card to double your winnings. It's like playing 50-50 in a game show. Exciting stuff, isn't it?

Overall, Aztec Magic Deluxe is packed with thrilling features that not only make the game enjoyable but have the potential to give you a significant advantage in terms of winning. So, what are you waiting for? Put those warrior instincts to test and let the magic of Aztec Magic Deluxe boost your luck!

The game grid for Aztec Magic Deluxe has 5 reels and 3 rows, and a range of variable pay lines from one to fifteen. Special Symbols

As per BGaming's tradition, the graphics immediately catch the eye for the definitiveness with which the symbols are represented and for the attention to detail. The grid is embedded inside a jewel with two torches lit on the pillars. At the bottom, we can find the main buttons, including the one to change the pay lines and the bet.

The music is a mix of nature sounds, including the sound of water and the cries of the animals populating the forest, and the beat of drums.

Slot Features:
The game grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, with variable pay lines from one to fifteen. This operation will not affect the cost per spin, which will always range from €0.01 to €1, but rather the probability of winning, which decreases with fewer active lines.

With the Autoplay function, you can activate from 10 to 1,000 automatic spins, and through pre-selected parameters, you can decide when to stop them.

Winning combinations refer to all those that occur on an active pay line with adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. In the case of multiple winning combos on the same line, only the highest one will be paid, while in the case of combos on different lines, the winnings will be added together.

The volatility is medium, while the RTP value is very good, at 96.96%.

Symbols and Features:
There are seven basic symbols, four non-themed and three themed. The first represents the cards good for a royal flush, ranging from ten to ace. The three medallions are instead payers. The first, silver, can pay up to 100 times the bet, the bronze up to 300, and the gold up to 500.

The Aztec warrior is the Wild symbol. In addition to replacing all symbols except the Scatter, it is paying, and in fact, it pays more than all. Every time it appears, it triples the winnings, but if it appears with 5 symbols, you can receive up to 5,000 times the bet! The priestess is instead the Scatter symbol, and can appear anywhere on the grid. Three, four or five Scatters give up to 10 free spins.

In Aztec Magic Deluxe there is also the Gamble function to try and double the winnings. In this case, every time a sum must be cashed, you can decide whether to risk it in a card game. In this case, a covered card will appear in the center of the screen, with two buttons on the sides, Red and Black. Our goal is to discover the color of the covered card.
